name: Skin Saviors™ Set
about: What it is:A full skincare regimen, in TSA-approved sizes, that cleanses, exfoliates, moisturizes, and protects..Skin Type:Normal.Highlighted Ingredients:- 2.2% Avobenzone and 7.5% Octinoxate: Provide sun protection..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens..What Else You Need to Know:The Pure Clean Daily Facial Cleanser is a dual purpose, two-in-one cleanser and toner that removes deep-down dirt and oil for clear, smooth, shave-ready skin. The Face Buff Energizing Scrub is a superior pre-shave cleanser and scrub in one that quickly removes dirt and dead skin cells, prepping your face for a closer, smoother shave. The Double Duty Face Moisturizer SPF 20 is a lightweight, advanced facial treatment product with a built-in SPF 20 sunscreen. The Intense Therapy Lip Balm SPF 25 is an emollient balm that soothes and relieves dry, chapped, irritated lips..This Set Contains:- 3 oz/ 88 mL Pure Clean Daily Facial Cleanser

Organic/Certifiés Organiques...As part of Jack Black’s commitment to always offer the highest quality products, some of the ingredients in these formulations may be updated from time to time. The ingredient list shown here may vary from product packaging, depending on the location and timing of purchase. In addition, packaging may have also been updated from what appears on the Jack Black website.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Pure Clean Daily Facial Cleanser:.-Apply a small amount to wet hands, work into a lather, and apply to face. .-Rinse. .-Use morning and night to cleanse skin. .-Follow with moisturizer...Face Buff Energizing Scrub:.-Use two to four times a week in the shower before shaving. .-Work a nickel-size amount on to wet face, rubbing gently in circles. .-The power of the scrub is built into the product, so you don’t have to rub vigorously...Double-Duty Face Moisturizer SPF 20:.-Use after cleansing and shaving. .-Apply liberally to face and neck 15 minutes before sun exposure...Moisture Therapy Lip Balm SPF 25, Natural Mint:.-Apply generously and evenly to lips 30 minutes before going out in the sun, or whenever they feel dry or chapped.
